content.question: A ball that is attached to a string travels in a horizontal, circular path, as shown in Figure 1. The forces exerted on the ball at <math alttext="t sub 0" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>0</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> are represented by the free-body diagram, as shown in Figure 2.
